meanings.definition: Resembling a mouse in appearance or behavior.
meanings.sent1: The small, mouselike creature scurried across the floor.
meanings.sent2: The toy had a mouselike design with whiskers and a tail.
meanings.sent3: The mouselike robot moved stealthily through the maze.
meanings.sent4: Her mouselike reflexes allowed her to dodge the falling objects.
meanings.sent5: The mouselike features of the character made it endearing to children.

meanings.sent1: She spoke in a soft, mouselike voice during the presentation.
meanings.sent2: The shy boy had a mouselike demeanor in social situations.
meanings.sent3: The mouselike librarian tiptoed around the library, avoiding loud noises.
meanings.sent4: His mouselike behavior in the meeting went unnoticed by most attendees.
meanings.sent5: The mouselike student preferred to observe rather than participate in class discussions.
